data.client_settings: Discord Canary Version 0.0.197, Build Number: 9625, Version Hash: 451841d5b2705f328d792d8b2db5c8e50960e125
data.expected_result: You get thrown out the settings or get a message saying you're not on the server anymore
data.short_description: Getting kicked from a server while in Server/Channel Settings crashes the client
data.steps_to_repro: - have a role where you can manage channels or server - get into the channel settings (or server settings) - get kicked while being in there
